description.summary: This cluster comprises senior-level marketing and communications professionals who lead strategic initiatives to enhance brand presence, drive engagement, and manage comprehensive marketing campaigns. They possess extensive experience in brand management, content strategy, public relations, and integrated marketing communications.
commonCharacteristics: Leadership roles in marketing and communications
Strategic planning and execution of marketing campaigns
Expertise in brand management and content strategy
description.typicalBackground: These professionals often hold advanced positions such as Director, Vice President, or Executive roles in marketing and communications departments. They typically have a strong background in managing large-scale marketing campaigns, developing brand strategies, and leading cross-functional teams to achieve organizational goals.

matchReasons: Title includes Vice President of Marketing
Responsibilities include managing national media and marketing campaigns
Skills in Marketing Strategy and Content Development
Title includes Group Account Director
Experience in strategic planning and brand management
Skills in Integrated Marketing and Communications
Title includes Director of Project Management
Experience in strategic operations and marketing
Skills in Strategy and Salesforce

description.summary: This cluster encompasses individuals dedicated to the planning, coordination, and execution of events and productions. They possess expertise in event logistics, stage management, vendor coordination, and ensuring seamless event operations. Their roles are critical in delivering memorable and well-organized experiences.
commonCharacteristics: Roles focused on event planning and execution
Expertise in logistics and vendor management
Ability to manage multiple events simultaneously
description.typicalBackground: Professionals in this cluster often hold titles such as Event Producer, Production Manager, or Stage Manager. They have a proven track record in managing various types of events, from corporate functions to large-scale productions, and are adept at coordinating resources and teams to ensure successful event outcomes.

matchReasons: Title includes Producer
Responsibilities include managing and executing over 70 events
Skills in Event Management and AV Management
Title includes Senior Account Supervisor in experiential marketing
Experience in producing national events and managing experiential activations
Skills in Event Production and Client Management
Title includes Director of Project Management
Experience in managing marketing operations and event logistics
Skills in Strategy and Project Coordination

description.summary: This cluster consists of creative leaders who drive the visual and strategic direction of brands. They excel in creative ideation, brand development, and crafting compelling visual narratives. Their expertise ensures that brand messaging is cohesive, engaging, and effectively communicates the brandâ€™s identity.
commonCharacteristics: Leadership roles in creative and brand strategy

They come from backgrounds in graphic design, art direction, or marketing, and have extensive experience in leading creative teams, developing brand identities, and executing visual strategies that resonate with target audiences.

clusters.title: Account Managers and Business Development Leaders

description.summary: This cluster includes professionals focused on managing client relationships, driving business growth, and expanding market presence. They excel in account management, client servicing, and developing strategic partnerships. Their roles are essential in maintaining client satisfaction and fostering long-term business relationships.
commonCharacteristics: Roles centered around client relationship management
Expertise in business development and strategic partnerships
Focus on driving sales growth and client satisfaction
description.typicalBackground: Professionals in this cluster often hold titles such as Account Manager, Account Director, or Vice President of Accounts. They possess strong interpersonal skills, a knack for identifying business opportunities, and a history of successfully managing client accounts to achieve revenue targets and foster growth.

matchReasons: Title includes Managing Director
Responsibilities include integrated marketing and digital strategy
Skills in Digital Strategy and Business Development
Title includes Senior Account Supervisor
Experience in managing client accounts and leading teams
Skills in Brand Development and Digital Strategy
